stimulusHtml:
A researcher in sports medicine is interested in comparing the amount of daily screen time between high school students who are athletes and high school students who are not athletes. A random sample of 100 high school students who are athletes and a random sample of 100 high school students who are not athletes will be selected. Each student will be asked “Do you typically have more than 3 hours of screen time each day?”

Which of the following is the most appropriate test for the researcher to use to investigate whether there is a difference in the amounts of daily screen time?
choicesHtml: A two-sample z-test for a difference between population proportions
A two-sample t-test for a difference between population proportions
A two-sample z-test for a difference between population means
A two-sample t-test for a difference between population means
